benefits.title: Re-envisioning Music Discovery.
benefits.problem: We're putting music discovery in the hands of the people listening to music,
benefits.solution: creating a more personal experience that forms a sense of community and helps you discover a new world of music, through a gamified platform.

benefits.title: Recognition.
benefits.problem: People with great tastes in music will rise to the top,
benefits.solution: making it easier to find profiles worth listening to as well as incentizing everyone in the community to work their way up to the spotlight.

benefits.title: Reward.
benefits.problem: Becoming a top resonating user will come with rewards.
